title: Paper Presentation
description: Participants present a paper on a topic of their choice related to technology or computer science. The presentation should be followed by a Q&A session.
rules: Participants must submit a paper in advance.
Only two participants per team. Not solo event.
Q&A session should not exceed 5 minutes.

title: Code Relay
description: Code Relay is a competitive programming event where problems must be solved in a strict sequential order. The output of each question serves as the input for the next.
rules: Participants must solve problems in a sequential order.
Participants must submit their solutions within the given time limit.

title: QueryCraft
description: QueryCraft is an SQL based event where participants are given a database and must write SQL queries to extract specific information. The queries will be evaluated based on correctness and efficiency.
rules: Participants must write SQL queries to extract information from a given database.
Queries will be evaluated based on correctness and efficiency.
Participants must submit their queries within the given time limit.
